title: cancalanATA nenjinilE
sahitya:
cancalanATA nenjinilE oru shakti pirakkudaDA


anupallavi

  vanjanaiyillA malar kani vanattaik-konji viLaiyADum kuLir malai aruvi pOl


caraNam    sUriyan pOl oru jyOtiyaik-kaNDadum sutantaram udikkudaDA
shUzhndu virindu parandiDum vAnilOr shuDar kavi pADudaDA
kAriya shakti valukkudaDA iLam kATrai uyarttiDavE
kaDavuLai iyarkkaiyil kaNDu teLindu kalandiDum kAdalinAl
